location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinston, Accountant General, Bombay and Captain Alexander Hay, Military Auditor General

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a hole in the folio that has partially obscured the address. However, the recipient can still be clearly identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of the receipt of a communication dated 17 August 1807 on the subject of the local prices of articles which make up a sepoy's daily ration.
